name: Huchuy Qosqo – Machu Picchu 3 Days 2 Nights
description: Huchuy Qosqo trek is one of the best hiking trips in the Peruvian Andean Mountains. For the local people this trek is consider one of the best and shorter trekking situated in the sacred valley and have been the enjoyment of many tourists who hike this marvelous place, where you will have a nice walking along beautiful lagoons, andean comunities and amazing archeological sites in the way to Machu Picchu. In this trek we will visit one of the Inca complexes that is not visited by many tourists. Huchuy Qosqo is located at an altitude of 2400 meters above the see level close to the Urubamba River in the Sacred Valley. This attractive it supposed to be a building for one of the most prestige Inca kings “Pachacutec”.we will take a train to Aguas Calientes spending the night and the on the next day we will Visit Machu Picchu that is considering as one of the seven wonders.
